pageContext.claim: “I've built something here. Over the last three and a half years, if you take a look -- take a look at what's been happening to the United States over the last almost three years. You take a look at the economic power that we've created. We've gone up -- in fact, the Vice Premier of China just said -- we've gone up trillions of dollars.”
pageContext.analysis: The size of a country's economy is measured by GDP, not the combined market capitalization of companies that sell their stock.
